content: Hey! Do you want to earn $5,000 a week working from home? Ask me how!
Hello! You’ve reached XYZ Home Services. Are you looking to schedule plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service today?
You won’t believe this system! I have clients making thousands daily! Just reply YES to learn more.
This number is for scheduling home service appointments only. If you have a home repair need, please let us know.
